messages.message:
Hi everyone, we’ve updated the “connect to cluster” command in sandbox console to
1. Automatically set the namespace to the cluster namespace so you can run `kubectl get pods` instead of `kubectl get pods -n <namespace>`. This should work for both tenants and hosts. This is enabled by default, but you can disable this if you’d like
2. Support clusters in the `instabase-test` AWS account. I believe currently these are just the crafting environments
